author: cautiousfox
title: The Great Migration (from Ethereum)
description: How might we make it easy and fast for dApps and other projects to expand or completely move from Ethereum to Cardano?
importance: Many projects are stuck on EVM-based blockchains like Ethereum and are looking for an escape. Cardano can be faster and cheaper to use.
success: Projects who were either planning to or did launch on an EVM-based blockchain deploy in the Cardano ecosystem and can do so easily.
